## Source: ossf-package-analysis (254d2393647ed3542624ba70e492121d384063e3c641fc0f93fb444bf130cbb1)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@nationalgeographicsociety/ngsui-footer' @ 100.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
